holidays.title: National Chili Day
holidays.description: When chili is being served, everyone comes to the table.

holidays.title: National Protein day
holidays.description: We focus on the health benefits of one of the body's most basic building blocks.

holidays.title: Anosmia Awareness Day
holidays.description: Take a deep breath as we learn more about the loss of the sense of smell!

holidays.title: Digital Learning Day
holidays.description: Get your minds and devices ready as we celebrate the adaptation of technology for learning.

holidays.title: Dominican Republic Independence Day
holidays.description: Join in the pomp and excitement — say hurrah to Dominicans as they celebrate their independence day!

holidays.title: Fat Thursday
holidays.description: Presenting the ultimate cheat day — join us as we bring good luck and cheer through donuts.

holidays.title: Feast of Saint Vartan
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate the Feast of Saint Vartan this February.

holidays.title: Introduce A Girl To Engineering Day
holidays.description: Spark curiosity and discover a whole new exciting world on Introduce a Girl to Engineering Day.

holidays.title: National Kahlua Day
holidays.description: Fancy joining us for a decadent cup of rich and smooth Kahlua?

holidays.title: National Pokemon Day
holidays.description: Trainers, are you ready to catch em' all on National Pokemon Day?

holidays.title: National Strawberry Day
holidays.description: You’re never far from a supplier of this tasty tongue-tickler!

holidays.title: National Toast Day
holidays.description: This read will definitely have you popping bread into the toaster, so here’s a heads-up.

holidays.title: No Brainer Day
holidays.description: Take this day to relax your mind and stop yourself from overthinking problems.

holidays.title: Paczki Day
holidays.description: Known as a dessert indulged in around lent, Paczki Day isn’t just about the pastries.

holidays.title: Retro Day
holidays.description: Let’s revisit the past on February 27, for it is Retro Day!

holidays.title: Special Operations Forces Day
holidays.description: Let us join in the celebrations of Russia's Special Operations Forces Day.

holidays.title: The Big Breakfast Day
holidays.description: What’s shakin’, bacon? Join us as we celebrate The Big Breakfast Day.

holidays.title: World NGO Day
holidays.description: Join us in celebrating this day that’s observed in over 89 countries and across six continents.

holidays.title: Elizabeth Taylor’s Birthday
holidays.description: The whole world was a stage for this talented and beautiful icon for the ages.

holidays.title: JWoww’s Birthday
holidays.description: This reality TV star and successful entrepreneur has carved a niche in the entertainment scene.

holidays.title: Money Man’s Birthday
holidays.description: This rapper worked hard to become one of the most well-known talents in America.

holidays.title: Steven Fernandez’s Birthday
holidays.description: Fernandez took over the world of skateboarding with his skills and confident, daring personality.

holidays.title: Ten’s Birthday
holidays.description: Greatness and world domination represent this talented K-pop and C-pop musician and dancer.
